(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (PRP I))
    (VP (VBP do) (RB n't)
      (VP (VB remember)
        (S
          (VP (VBG eating)
            (NP
              (NP (NNP Mao) (NNP Shan) (NNP Wang))
              (SBAR
                (WHADVP (WRB when))
                (S
                  (NP (PRP I))
                  (VP (VBD was)
                    (VP (VBG growing)
                      (PRT (RP up))
                      (PP (IN in)
                        (NP (DT the) (CD 70) (NNS 's))))))))))))
    (. .)))


nsubj(remember-4, I-1)
aux(remember-4, do-2)
neg(remember-4, n't-3)
root(ROOT-0, remember-4)
xcomp(remember-4, eating-5)
nn(Wang-8, Mao-6)
nn(Wang-8, Shan-7)
dobj(eating-5, Wang-8)
advmod(growing-12, when-9)
nsubj(growing-12, I-10)
aux(growing-12, was-11)
rcmod(Wang-8, growing-12)
prt(growing-12, up-13)
prep(growing-12, in-14)
det('s-17, the-15)
num('s-17, 70-16)
pobj(in-14, 's-17)

  (S
    (ADVP (RB ie))
    (NP (DT the) (NNS trees))
    (VP (VBD were)
      (VP (VBN grown)
        (ADVP (RB naturally))
        (PP (IN from)
          (NP (NN seed)))))
    (. .)))

            (VP (VBN elongated)
              (CC and)

    (. .)))
